DOC.brief_summary: This purpose study evaluate therapeutic efficacy burst microdosing stimulation paradigm patient chronic pain .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multicenter , randomize , double-blinded crossover study design compare conventional burst stimulation parameter two different burst microdosing paradigm . Subjects randomize 1:1:1 one three group . Each group evaluate 3 stimulation paradigm different order .
DOC.criteria: Subject implant commercially available SJM spinal cord stimulator control chronic intractable pain associate back and/or leg pain ; Subject exclusively use burst stimulation least three month ; Subject 18 year age old ; Subject 's painrelated medication regimen stable 4 week prior screen evaluation ; Subject agree add increase painrelated medication enrollment study duration ; Subject willing cooperate study requirement include compliance regimen completion office visit ; Subject currently participate clinical investigation study include active treatment arm ; Subject currently receive , apply consider seek worker compensation , involved disability litigation ; Subject non SJM neuromodulation device
